title: The Belgian Waffle Ride and Monuments of Cycling announces policy changes around race classifications and more
content:
BWR organizer Monuments of Cycling announces changes they say have the "full intent to foster positive, world-class experiences that promote personal growth and healthy competition."

Read the full article at The Belgian Waffle Ride and Monuments of Cycling announces policy changes around race classifications and more on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
